r.d: xrange is a compiled extension that provides numeric iteration primitives to PHP on top of SPL. It includes a lean numeric range generator / iterator, modeled after Python's xrange() function. It's intended to provide an alternative for all numeric iteration and looping.
r.n: - Fixed version numbering scheme (x.y.z) - Added missing classes to php_info output - Fix for bug #13225 - implicit declaration warnings
